net.iceyleagons.frostedengineering.network

Class Tracer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.iceyleagons.frostedengineering.network.Tracer

  • public class Tracer
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for merging, splitting Networks using the Depth First Search algorithm. Due to the probability of heavy calculations it's run asynchronously with ExecutorService
    Author:
    TOTHTOMI

      Tracer()

      static void addToNetwork(Unit unit, Network network)
      This is a helper function to add Units to networks with one simple method rather than multiple.
      private static java.util.List<Unit> dfs(Unit unit)
      Depth First Search algorithm implementation using Stack This will return all the connections that we can use later on.
      static void trace(Unit unit)
      This will start the tracing, and decide between merging and splitting.

      This will start the merging process.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Tracer

        public Tracer()

    • Method Detail

      • trace

        public static void trace(@NonNull
                         Unit unit)
        This will start the tracing, and decide between merging and splitting. It is decided with the Unit.isDestroyed() boolean, therefore if the Unit got broken set Unit.setDestroyed(boolean) to true before running this method.
        Parameters:
        unit - Unit to start from, basically which got broken/placed

      • traceMerge

        private static void traceMerge(@NonNull
                               Unit unit)
        This will start the merging process.
        Parameters:
        unit - Unit to start from, basically which got placed

      • traceSplit

        private static void traceSplit(@NonNull
                               Unit unit)
        This will start the splitting process.
        Parameters:
        unit - Unit to start from, basically which got broken

      • addToNetwork

        public static void addToNetwork(@NonNull
                                Unit unit,
                                @NonNull
                                Network network)
                         throws UnsupportedUnitType
        This is a helper function to add Units to networks with one simple method rather than multiple.
        Parameters:
        unit - Unit to add
        network - Network to add to
        Throws:
        UnsupportedUnitType - if the provided Network doesn't support that Unit ex. you can only add an EnergyUnit to an EnergyNetwork

      • dfs

        private static java.util.List<Unit> dfs(@NonNull
                                        Unit unit)
        Depth First Search algorithm implementation using Stack This will return all the connections that we can use later on.
        Parameters:
        unit - Unit to start from
        Returns:
        a List of Units that are connected together in some way.
